name: test_NAF_7_6_0_Edit_User_Role
description:
Test that a user with admin role has access to the whole list of mobile users, 
where admins are identified by "admin" role.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Go to the login page
3. Enter the admin credentials
4. Click the login button
5. Verify that the user is logged in
6. Edit user role
7. Verify that the user role is updated

labels.name: story
labels.value: 7.5.0 User with the admin role can reset password from the CMS login page
